column1: “18.  The  appellant  contests  that  the  additional  Nation  Building  Tax
liability  assessed  on  the  sale  of  petrol  and  diesel  in  third  party  filling
stations as the turnover derived from manufactures petrol and diesel are
exempted  articles  under  Part  1  of  the  First  Schedule  of  Nation  Building
Tax  Act  and  non  manufactured  petrol  and  diesel  are  excluded  articles
under section 3(2)(iv) of the Nation Building Tax Act”.
